name: Blue Cheese and Beef Meatballs
author: sandra
summary: Juicy meatballs with tasty bursts of blue cheese and onion. My own recipe, and my husband absolutely loves them.Good enough to eat alone. I personally think they would also be good in hoagie sandwiches.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a jelly roll pan with aluminum foil
Mix ground beef, bread crumbs, eggs, blue cheese, onion, pepper, and salt together in a bowl; shape into 22 meatballs and arrange onto prepared pan
Bake meatballs until they are very firm, hot, and grey in the center, about 30 minutes
An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center should read 160 degrees F (70 degrees C)
